thread.title: Simple, easy and well outfitted
thread.title_full: Simple, easy and well outfitted - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: blevin3000
title: Simple, easy and well outfitted
text:
For a business hotel with easy access to central London, this was a remarkable value. Polite and efficient staff, well outfitted room and comfortable. We booked two rooms for our family, and had plenty of space to move around, eat a late dinner ordered on the hotel's corporate Seamless.com account, and watch a movie. We stayed in London the night before our flight, and I wish we'd been able to stay longer.
Room Tip: The overhead light is a bit harsh, but otherwise the room is quiet, comfortable and well outfitted f... See more room tips
